attributes.additional_details: Please help us! I live in a 2bedroom flat with my husband and 3 children. We have severe damp and mould that has caused my 12week old to be extremely poorly since she was 3 weeks old, my other 2 children aged 6&1 have also suffered various illnesses due to the mould, most recently my 29 year old husband had a mini stroke due to the stress and mould itself. The council say we aren't a priority!! Please sign and help us to be moved!
